Description: Elliptical bronze mirror with a lotiform handle decorated with four figures in the form of uraei.
Curator's comments: Published: Husson, L'Offrande du Miroir dans les Temples Egyptiens de l'epoque Greco-Romaine, (1977), Pl. XII, 18. Un Arte per la Belleza, (Padua 1984), p. 50 [61] = Un Arte per la Belleza, (Lugano 1984), p. 50 [114]. Budge, Mummy, p.263.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
